lead_paragraph: NELSON--Merlin E. With happy memories of our Honorary Chairman and the thousands of fun miles enjoyed together. The 72nd St. Marathoning and Pasta Club 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  NELSON, MERLIN E
